Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Bead
Description: Rozette bead, very probably made of rock crystal, with a flat surface (1,55 cm in diametre) and a rounded surface with incised radiating lines (1,85 cm in diametre). The thickness is 0,8 cm. Pierced in the middle.
